mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.mis.tmp.service.dao.TargetMarketStatusDAO.selectManuMarketStatusByCondition] */ SELECT #{sMarketStatusYyMm} AS SEARCH_DATE , '全国份额' AS NAME_AREA , ROUND(A.REF_VAL, 2) AS LOCAL_POSSESSION_RATE , CASE WHEN B.BM_REF_VAL > 0 THEN ROUND(A.REF_VAL / B.BM_REF_VAL * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END AS LOCAL_LAST_MONTH_CONTRAST , CASE WHEN C.BY_REF_VAL > 0 THEN ROUND(A.REF_VAL / C.BY_REF_VAL * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END AS LOCAL_LAST_YEAR_MONTH FROM ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE REG_YY||REG_MM = #{sMarketStatusYyMm} GROUP BY REG_YY, REG_MM ) A ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS BM_REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE REG_YY||REG_MM = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{sMarketStatusYyMm}, 'YYYYMM')-1, 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY REG_YY, REG_MM ) B ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS BY_REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE REG_YY||REG_MM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{sMarketStatusYyMm}, 'YYYYMM'), -12), 'YYYYMM') GROUP BY REG_YY, REG_MM ) C UNION ALL SELECT #{sMarketStatusYyMm} AS SEARCH_DATE , '本省份额' AS NAME_AREA , ROUND(a.REF_VAL, 2) as LOCAL_POSSESSION_RATE , CASE WHEN B.BM_REF_VAL > 0 THEN ROUND(A.REF_VAL / B.BM_REF_VAL * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END AS LOCAL_LAST_MONTH_CONTRAST , CASE WHEN C.BY_REF_VAL > 0 THEN ROUND(A.REF_VAL / C.BY_REF_VAL * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END AS LOCAL_LAST_YEAR_MONTH FROM ( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE REG_YY||REG_MM = #{sMarketStatusYyMm} AND SUNG_CD = #{sMarketStatusProvince} GROUP BY REG_YY, REG_MM ) A ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS BM_REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE REG_YY||REG_MM = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{sMarketStatusYyMm}, 'YYYYMM')-1, 'YYYYMM') AND SUNG_CD = #{sMarketStatusProvince} GROUP BY REG_YY, REG_MM ) B ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(SUM(REF_VAL)),0) AS BY_REF_VAL FROM MS_0107T WHERE
